channel.title: NPC Drops?
channel.description:
so on my delta server the drops for any monster look something like this:
[code=java]//Man npcdrop = 1 526 1 100 npcdrop = 1 995 500 50 npcdrop = 1 494 1 10 npcdrop = 1 841 1 8 npcdrop = 1 882 50 8 npcdrop = 1 1062 250 1[/code]
So this means there's a chance that the npc has a chance to drop more than just bones and another item. Theres even a very small chance that the npc could drop every item at once.
On most 508 servers i notice that you tend to only receive bones and one other item or something similar per drop. Does anyone know how i can do this for my server?
